content.rendered:
Directed by Ajay Bahl

Written by Ajay Bahl. Pawan Sony

Cast Taapsee Pannu (Gayatri / Gautami). Gulshan Devaiah (Neel). Abhilash Thapliyal (Chander). Sorabh Chauhan (Bipin Nath). Kruttika Desai (Mrs. Radha Solanki (as Kritika Desai)). S.M. Zaheer (Old Man / Rajendra Saha). Babita Anant (Alpana Head Nurse). Abhishek Deswal (Hotel Manager)

Language Hindi

Producers Prashant Asawa. Tony D’souza. Kalpesh Damani. Manav Durga. Alex Anthony Fernandes. Rahul Gandhi. Param Gill. Sameer Kamble. Pranjal Khandhdiya. Kabir Lal. Taapsee Pannu. Rajugopal Podala. Vishal Rana. Pradeep Sharma. Shilpan Vyas Tinu. Mayank Tiwari

Production Echelon Productions. Outsiders Films. Zee Studios
